sense.name: imagine; form a mental picture of something
sense.commentary: NOTE: Compare to sense 2. In this sense the thing being visualized does not actually exist in concrete form in the same place as the visualizer.
sense.examples: Visualize a nice meadow by a babbling brook, it helps relieve stress. I can visualize my daughter as the president of the US someday. Visualize your way to health and a new life. The psychic had a talent to visualize events before they happened.

sense.name: MEDICAL: make visible with the help of machinery
sense.commentary: NOTE: Compare to sense 1. In this sense the thing being visualized is a concrete object somewhere near the visualizer.
sense.examples: The radiologist can visualize the cancerous liver in the X-rays. This machine visualizes ultrasound. We visualized the density of the distribution of C2.
